mapper.insert: insert into newBoard_table(boardWriter, boardTitle, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
insert into newBoard_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d") as createdAt, boardHits from newBoard_table order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
